summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of the south one-half of Hanford Street, from Thirty-seventh Avenue South to Cascadia Avenue; Hunter Boulevard, from Hanford Street to the north line of Lot "B" of Block 41 and Lot "A" of Block 48 of Mt. Baker park Addition to the City of Seattle, Cascadia Avenue, from Hanford Street to the north line of Lot "A" of Block 57 and Lot "A" of Block 64 of Mt. Baker Park Addition to the City of Seattle, all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same and constructing concrete walks and necessary wooden curbs and gutters, and providing for all necessary drainage, in accordance with Resolution No. 1950 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
